mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INDENT_RESOURCE ( IR_ORIGINALNAME, IR_FORMATNAME, IR_INDENTID, IR_PROCESSINSTANCEID, IR_TASKID, IR_TYPE, IR_USERTYPE, IR_USERID )VALUES( #{irOriginalName}, #{irFormatName}, ${irIndentId}, #{irProcessInstanceId}, #{irTaskId}, #{irtype}, #{irUserType}, ${irUserId} );
mapper.update: UPDATE INDENT_RESOURCE ir SET ir.IR_ORIGINALNAME=#{irOriginalName}, ir.IR_FORMATNAME=#{irFormatName}, ir.IR_VIEWNAME=#{irViewName}, ir.IR_INDENTID=${irIndentId}, ir.IR_PROCESSINSTANCEID=#{irProcessInstanceId}, ir.IR_TASKID=#{irTaskId}, ir.IR_TYPE=#{irtype}, ir.IR_USERTYPE=#{irUserType}, ir.IR_USERID=${irUserId} WHERE ir.IR_ID=${irId};
mapper.select: SELECT ir.IR_ID AS irId, ir.IR_ORIGINALNAME AS irOriginalName, ir.IR_FORMATNAME AS irFormatName, ir.IR_VIEWNAME AS irViewName, ir.IR_INDENTID AS irIndentId, ir.IR_PROCESSINSTANCEID AS irProcessInstanceId, ir.IR_TASKID AS irTaskId, DATE_FORMAT(ir.IR_CREATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS irCreateDate, ir.IR_TYPE AS irtype, ir.IR_USERTYPE AS irUserType, ir.IR_USERID AS irUserId FROM INDENT_RESOURCE ir WHERE ir.IR_INDENTID=${id} ORDER BY ir.IR_ID DESC;

SELECT ir.IR_ID AS irId, ir.IR_ORIGINALNAME AS irOriginalName, ir.IR_FORMATNAME AS irFormatName, ir.IR_INDENTID AS irIndentId, ir.IR_PROCESSINSTANCEID AS irProcessInstanceId, ir.IR_TASKID AS irTaskId, DATE_FORMAT(ir.IR_CREATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS irCreateDate, ir.IR_TYPE AS irtype, ir.IR_USERTYPE AS irUserType, ir.IR_USERID AS irUserId FROM INDENT_RESOURCE ir WHERE ir.IR_PROCESSINSTANCEID=#{processInstanceId} AND ir.IR_TASKID=#{taskDefinitionKey} ;

SELECT ir.IR_ID as irId, ir.IR_ORIGINALNAME AS irOriginalName, ir.IR_FORMATNAME AS irFormatName , ir.IR_VIEWNAME AS irViewName, ir.IR_INDENTID AS irIndentId, ir.IR_PROCESSINSTANCEID AS irProcessInstanceId , ir.IR_TASKID AS irTaskId, DATE_FORMAT(ir.IR_CREATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS IR_CREATEDATE, ir.IR_TYPE AS irtype, ir.IR_USERTYPE AS irUserType, ir.IR_USERID AS irUserId FROM INDENT_RESOURCE ir WHERE ir.IR_ID=${irId};
